title: Can't retrieve 2021 ncaab data
body:
**Issue**
I am trying to retrieve 2020-21 (current) ncaab data using code from the documentation. Upon doing so, I get an error `list index out of range`. Why is this?

**Code**
```python
import pandas as pd
from sportsipy.ncaab.teams import Teams

teams = Teams(2021)
for team in teams:
    schedule = team.schedule  # Returns a Schedule instance for each team
    # Returns a Pandas DataFrame of all metrics for all game Boxscores for
    # a season.
    df = team.schedule.dataframe_extended

IndexError: list index out of range
```

Same thing happens when I set the year to `2020`. I am confused as to why this is happening, since I used the exact same code from the repo.

**Version/OS**
I am using Google Colab with `sportsipy 0.6.0`

**Additional**
This is my very first time opening a GitHub issue, so I apologize if I did not follow any conventional methods of submitting an issue.
